name: v0-t-shirt-design-editor
description: A T-shirt design editor with AI integration

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npm run clean; cd ../backend && npm run clean
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test

author: yeesiang03
